description: A plugin for performing general data transformations using code snippets.
explanation: This plugin executes a provided Python code snippet to transform input data.

inputDefinitions.name: script
inputDefinitions.description: The Python code snippet to execute for transformation. The code should define a function named 'transform_data' that accepts 'input_data' and returns the transformed data.

inputDefinitions.name: script_parameters
inputDefinitions.description: The input data (JSON object) to be transformed by the code snippet.

outputDefinitions.name: transform_result
outputDefinitions.description: The transformed output data (JSON object) after executing the code snippet.
